website_summaries.verdict: Sony's PSP Traveler Case does a fine job of marrying form, function, and protection.
pros: helps improve grip while playing games
storage slots for two PSP games and two Memory Stick Duo cards
retains access to key ports and switches
cons: May be too bulky for some

customer_reviews.title: Get this protective case, if any
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Sony PSP PlayGear Pocket. The latter is more manageable, but does not protect your PSP on a fall, especially the screen. The Travel Case comes with a protective screen to hold it, it's got a thicker layer of protection, and you can put two discs in the case. The only disadvangage is that it's more cumbersome and somewhat heavier to handle than the Sony PSP PlayGear Pocket. I got both to see the difference, and I do use the Sony PSP PlayGear Pocket in my house, but for travel always the Travel Case. Get the travel case, if you will only get one protective case.
customer_reviews.author: Electrical Residential Service

customer_reviews.title: NOT for first generation models
customer_reviews.text: 1 star because I bought it based upon the answer to the first question above saying it was for first gen PSP models. It's not, it won't work at all. It is for 2000s and 3000s only. Seeing as I've already ripped open the packaging, looks like this case is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hardshell
customer_reviews.text: This case is a little clunky but cannot be destroyed. You can also take the rubber parts out and put your own pictures to be displayed to the outside of the clear plastic case. It fits one Phatty PSP and 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas D.

customer_reviews.title: good just one problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this items a few weeks ago I think is the best way to protect the psp console. And the umd carriers are a nice touch that really helps out. I have only one complain about it, which i didn't see in other reviews it doesn't have the ability to use your headphones while its inside i tought that i could use them i had a great dissapointment but besides that is a good choice
customer_reviews.author: Andres Pacheco Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great little case
customer_reviews.text: Protected my PSP through a deployment to Iraq. I definite must for anyone who likes to travel with their PSP.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Roh

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Picture
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is really good but I was led to believe that it was a psp 1000 case since that is what is on the picture and there is no clarification that it was for the PSP slim. This will not fit in a PSP 1000 but if you have a 2000 or 3000 there is no better case out there.
customer_reviews.author: Invader369

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you have a PSP Slim.
customer_reviews.text: I recommend not purchasing this item as a bundle with the new PSP Slim. Amazon should of pointed this out, that the New PSP Slim does not fit snuggly in the case. I have drop this case twice and the PSP will fall out. I guess they(Amazon) expect people to buy it, then write a review about it. Instead of making Better quality insurance of the product, telling the consumer it "DOES NOT WORK WELL WITH THE NEW PSP SLIM".
customer_reviews.author: Anastacio Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: great cover for psp
customer_reviews.text: the case works well at protecting my psp, I was happy with the quick delivery and that the product description matched my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: SusyHerrera

customer_reviews.title: Strong, Hard to play games while in case.
customer_reviews.text: Very strong case for cheap. However, it's a little hard to play your games while your PSP is in the case.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Szewczuk

customer_reviews.title: A really horrrible case
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Hard to get in and out of the case. So much so that my 11 year old doesn't even use it because they don't want to have to try to get it out. You cannot use the PSP in it easily either. Try something else.q
customer_reviews.author: RoodyPoo

customer_reviews.title: PSP Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: This item was as advertised and came quickly to me. It is sturdy and I was proud to give it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Bug

customer_reviews.title: it's a must buy PSP case.
customer_reviews.text: This Case is perfect. makes you feel that your PSP is safe the whole time. also you can store as much memory sticks as you want and Games too. you have to earn it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamer Y. Aflah

customer_reviews.title: it works ok
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it is for the Fat, not the slim but it works for it it why i gave it 4
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great case!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this travel case for the PSP, and I love it! Nothing's gonna mess up, crack, whatever, your PSP in this thing. The clear polycarb screen guard is really why I bought this model of case, to use for movies when traveling with my daughter. The earphone cut-out needs a touch with a dremel, but if you press, the earphone jack should still be accessible. The only downside. Personally, I don't play the PSP in the case on my own, just use it for protection and when with my girl. It fits my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Hopcake

customer_reviews.title: Loose Fit
customer_reviews.text: Really good at protecting psp, but doesn't hold it in well at all. It easily falls out. This shouldn't be much of a problem with adults, but don't get it if your psp is used by young kids (who tend to grab it from one another & then the psp falls to the ground). It's a good thing the psp is a sturdy "computer". I do like the fact that you can plug everything in with the lid closed. Oh, if you buy this & have kids playing the psp, take it out of this case first, then no problem.
customer_reviews.author: FireFly

customer_reviews.title: " Not that good "
customer_reviews.text: the travel case does provide good protection to the psp. the polycarbonate screen guard is great. it keeps the psp screen from getting scrathes but the protecter it self gets scrathced easily. it also provides 2 umd storage and 2 memory cards can be placed. the bad thing is the case adds weight to the psp. that makes it uncombtrable. its also hard to grip. i got a blister on my hand my accidently scrathing my self on the corner of this case. the matireal isnt soft. so all in all it really is up to you to deside if yuo want it or not.
customer_reviews.author: G.A.

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This item is awsome for a psp. I bought it cause, my Psp was starting to have some scraches on the screen. This item works better than the screen protectors. This has a plastic screen shield, and also the case is sturdy and dint even break even if it fell down on the hard floor couple of times. Very useful as a psp case. It can also be used as a stand while watching vidoes or movies. Only bad side is that it feels a little heavy. Other than that, its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. Naraparaju

customer_reviews.title: Almost great bout one serious flaw
customer_reviews.text: This case could be a great thing but for one brain dead bit of design, when the psp is snugly in the case you can't plug headphones in. There is a hole in the case for it but the actual headphone plug in the psp does not line up with the hole. Disappointing. If you won't need the headphones then this case is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ope

customer_reviews.title: it works ok
customer_reviews.text: it's a bit bulky.. but, i do like the screen protector, and extra storage(although, i havent used them yet) this isent for new psp tho. doesnt have a hole for new audio jack placement. i drilled a hole thru mine, but you have to be careful about it. hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for protecting your display screen.
customer_reviews.text: Sony's PSP travel case is ok. Does the job. The space for plugin a jack is miss-placed though (you have to lift the PSP a little to be able to plug it), which is somehow puzzling as both things are made by Sony. I wanted logitech's travel case originally (which has better reviews and was even cheaper), but shippment took longer. I believe they both have the same price now, check around.
customer_reviews.author: Barbanegra

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit PSP2000 well
customer_reviews.text: Sony needs to release a new version of this case. It does allow you to protect your PSP2000 but its a little lose in the case, and you can't connect ear phones while its in the case. They moved the ear phone jack on the PSP2000 and its doesn't line up with any of the access holes. Its still a good case for its protection value, but don't exepect the holes to line up with all the ports on the PSP2000.
customer_reviews.author: DavidD

customer_reviews.title: PSP carry case
customer_reviews.text: This case is sturdy enough to protect your PSP but not sturdy enough to keep from breaking. Mine is still functional but the plastic clasp broke and so it won't close completely.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case! It may be a bit bulky, but it works wonderfully! It not only holds, and protects your PSP, but it protects your screen, and holds two games, and memory sticks! It also makes holding it ALOT more comfortable,
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jones

customer_reviews.title: PSP travel case
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I was looking for something with a little storage capability and this has it. It stores up to 2 games and 4 memory cards. It also folds into a stand that holds your psp so you can view movies without holding the psp. It may be a little clunky but it does the job and more. I would recomend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Collums

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Showed up on time and in great condition! The case itself is awesome, the screen cover is hard to open the first few times but after that it's just fine. I used it flying and it worked as a hands free stand for watching movies too!
customer_reviews.author: K. M. GUZMANN

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY!, works on the PSP Slim
customer_reviews.text: The sony travel casse is a must have to protect your 160-200+ dollar investment, it works for the slim but the headphon jack doesnt line up (you could probably use an ice pick heated by the stove) the screen protector works well and i give this item a 5, out of 5
customer_reviews.author: louisianian

customer_reviews.title: Not for Slim
customer_reviews.text: This case is not for the PSP Slim model. It is made for the original (larger) model so my Slim does not fit securely. I am able to make it work by using the screen cover as a "strap" to secure it. I basically jam the screen cover latch in between the case and the PSP.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PSP Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: The case is amazing, but we have a psp slim and the case is for an older model. i love the case.
customer_reviews.author: V. Swinton

customer_reviews.title: is great... protect you psp
customer_reviews.text: its realy nice... it protect your PSP all the parts... is a great product..
customer_reviews.author: Jean De Luca

customer_reviews.title: YEAH
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty awsome. But the only problem is, that its alittle too big. almost everything is covered in rubber and no matter how many times i try to scratch the protection screen with a knife it won't penetrate. I even tried dropping it from a 3 story building to see if it would break. Although the plastic cracked my psp is still in perfect condition. I would recommend this for your psp for those noobs out there.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gates

customer_reviews.title: Not a game but an accesory
customer_reviews.text: This is great for carrying your PSP around. I keep my game console in my bag and carry it witjh me most places. So far no damage to my game and the case has taken all the abuse, so far only scratches. Looks good too. A must if you want to take your PSP with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse B

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great service, great item, my child is very happy - would have liked to know what was needed to down load movies, music, (ex. usb chord) not a problem I have ordered one. Maybe a reminder that one is needed, I have several usb chords at home but this item needed a mini. But, otherwise very happy.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: PSP Travel Case
customer_reviews.text: The Case isn't that great. The Plastic face plate won't stay closed on game. There are sharp edges that interfere with players hands/fingers when trying to play. This is a decent case for just holding game. Not for Playing it and keeping it safe at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Rippy

customer_reviews.title: Works for 2000 only
customer_reviews.text: this product works for the Psp 2000. The only way i found this out was when i actually bought the product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hills

customer_reviews.title: This is a PSP Game Holder
customer_reviews.text: My son is thrilled with his PSP Game Holder. It protects his system and holds 2 games in a storage container. It has worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret K. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Useful Product
customer_reviews.text: PSP travel case is elegant. The best part is that the PSP can reside in it, while you can play/charge, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Singhal

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I orderded this product for my sone. He loves this carrying case because it keeps his game secured.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra F. Bronson

customer_reviews.title: It Sucks
customer_reviews.text: The rubber lining got my PSP all grimy and covered in oil and dirt. It took me Two hours to clean. Do NOT get this case
customer_reviews.author: P. Gilardi

customer_reviews.title: Good Shipment
customer_reviews.text: Shipment came as promised within a reasonable amount of time and was brand new as advertised. Straightforward, good service.
customer_reviews.author: Hector

product_meta.title: PSP Traveler Case
product_meta.description: This stylish hard case protects and transports your PSP game system, two Memory Stick Duo cards and two UMD discs. You'll have everything you need to get your game on, all in a safe, secure and tight-fitting case. Show the gaming world that you're ready for anything with this durable case.
feature_bullets: Custom-fit case protects your PSP and its accessories from bumps, bangs and dings
Stylish case shows the world that you are a gaming champ
Take this case with you wherever you go and gain peace of mind about the safety of your PSP

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars81 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
